column4: Is it normal that GParted takes several hours to resize a FAT32 partition from 160GB to 500GB ?
is there a better tool than GParted to resize a large FAT32 partition?
got a second disk - back up your data and to a straight forward format methinks resizing upwards is a total pain of an operation (mostly because of that how well that file system is documented)]#
thanks for the suggestion but I don't have enough space on my other discs for all that data
